mapper.insert: insert into playlist (playlist_id, user_id, playlist_name, description, created_at, updated_at) values (#{playlistId}, #{userId}, #{playlistName}, #{description}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update playlist set playlist_name=#{playlistName}, description=#{description}, updated_at=now() where playlist_id=#{playlistId}
mapper.select: select playlist_id playlistId, user_id userId, playlist_name playlistName, description, created_at createdAt, updated_at updatedAt from playlist
